Posts.Content: Shovel. I'm at the same point...waiting aargh x Like you my husband knows but I don't want to worry family/friends when odds are it's nothing sinister *touches wood*. It must be so much more difficult when your family have already been touched by cancer. Other than getting myself along to the GP, the best thing I've done so far is find this community. Stop googling if you can - between here and breastcancercare.org you have all the information and advice you need. Wishing you all the very best x
Posts.Title: Not diagnosed but terrified
